cmd.name: [[16703466]]@Iron Working[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16713797]]First Human upgrade. \n\n Allows Peasants to construct buildings for resource collection and defence away from the Human Town Hall and allows the training of first level units in your colonies.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16720640]]Cra@ftsmanship[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16736680]]Second Human upgrade. \n\n Enables the development of additional Human units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16742090]]@New Frontiers[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16758566]]Third Human upgrade. \n\n Allows the training of second level units in your colonies and enables the development of additional Human units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16769223]]@Upgrade to Archery Range[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16774823]]Allows the training of Longbowmen. Longbowmen are versatile ranged units, which can be upgraded to have a very long range and inflict additional damage to buildings.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16782459]]@Militia[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16792141]]Improves the Pikemen's training to fight in town, tripling their damage when near friendly buildings.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16822183]]Pre@cision[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16839556]]Increases Longbowmen damage by #GetClassInt('Human_Longbowman', 'reinfarrows_bonus')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16842332]]@Explosive Arrows[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16853093]]Enables Longbowmen to deal 1-#GetClassInt('Human_Longbowman', 'explosivearrow_damage_max')# additional damage to buildings.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16868063]]Swordsman S@tamina[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16877142]]Increases the movement and attack speed of Swordsmen by #GetClassInt('Human_Swordsman', 'stamina_speed_bonus')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16883346]]@Reinforced Pikes[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16894973]]Increases the Pikemen's damage against mounted units by #GetClassInt('Human_Pikeman', 'reinforced_spear_damage')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16901969]]@Composite Longbows[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16914314]]Doubles the Longbowmen's range.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16928744]]@Boiled Leather[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16931516]]Increases the speed of your cavalry units by 20% and their health by #GetClassInt('Human_Cavalry','adv_armor_health_bonus')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16947886]]@Upgrade to Cathedral of the Sun[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16953139]]Allows the training of Paladins. Paladins are powerful warriors, best suited to lead an army of smaller units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16961210]]@Life Steal[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16974945]]Enables Monks to steal life energy from enemy units and transfer it to nearby friendly units in Light armour.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16986070]]@Leadership[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[16997777]]Allows Paladins to increase the damage of nearby allied warriors by #GetClassInt('Human_Paladin', 'leadership_percent')#% each time the Paladin kills an enemy.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17009470]]@Weakness[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17012452]]Renders cursed units incapable of defending themselves, making their armour value negative.In additional making both witch and the shadow mistress stronger.[[]]

cmd.name: [[11913412]]@Death Blow[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17024042]]Enables Paladins to use a special attack that instantly kills any enemy with less than #GetClassInt('Human_Paladin', 'death_blow_health_percent')#% health.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17039503]]@Exorcism[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17040330]]Provides Oracles with a spell that deals #GetClassInt('Human_Oracle','exorcism_damage')# area damage to summoned units and illusions.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17051286]]@Holy Armour[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[holyarmour]]Provides Oracles with the Holy Armour spell, which doesn't allow a unit to receive more than #GetClassInt('Human_Oracle', 'holyshield_damagemax')# damage per hit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17061738]]@Stealth[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17074851]]Allows Squires to move in complete silence, making them invisible for enemies until they attack.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17088778]]@Heavy Horse Armour[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17090275]]Allows the training of Knights.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17101423]]@Sentry Tower[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17119511]]Enables the Tower to reveal all invisible units in its sight.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17128894]]@Weapon Markets[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17135534]]Decreases the training time of units trained in your colonies by #GetClassInt('Human_Townhall', 'weaponmarket_speedup')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[17143614]]@Champion's Equipment[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[17158222]]Equips each of your Champions, including the ones not yet hired, with a new item of fine quality.[[]]

cmd.name: [[SpiritualBlessing]]Health Potion@s[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[SpiritualBlessing1]]Increases the health of all human units by #GetClassInt('Human_Townhall', 'spiritual_blessing_bonus')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16805527]]@Golden Armour[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[168193472]]Reduces the damage infantry and cavalry receive from ranged attacks by #GetClassInt('Human_Swordsman', 'goldenshield_damage_reduction')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[16805526]]@Golden Shield[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[168193472x]]Reduces the damage Pikemen receive from ranged attacks by #GetClassInt('Human_Pikeman', 'goldenshield_damage_reduction')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[ArmoredArms]]@Inquisitor's Way[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[ArmoredArms1]]Gives your Paladins two abilities to use: "Wisdom of the Oracle" and "Wrath of the Inquisitor". "Wisdom of the Oracle" allows the Paladins to accumulate the energy required to activate the "Wrath of the Inquisitor". "Wrath", adds an aura that damages nearby enemies and grants the ability to reveal invisible units[[]]
